eg.ui

Class MainWin

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.ui.MainWin

  • public class MainWin
extends java.lang.Object
    The main window with a split view to which areas components can be added

        public void addToFunctionPanel(java.awt.Component c,

        Parameters:
        c - the Component that is added
        title - the title (filename) for the tab
